ti:edition.ti:label: Historiae Animalium Epitome
ti:edition.ti:description: Aristophanes of Byzantium. Excerptorum Constantini De Natura Animalium Duo Aristophanis Historiae Animalium Epitome subiunctis Aeliani Timothei aliorumque eclogis (Supplementum Aristotelicum, Volume 2). Lampros, Spyridon Paulou, editor. Berlin: Reimer, 1885
